title: Challenge Cards
content:
Challenge cards are shuffled into the challenge deck that sits above the surroundings during play.

A challenge card shows each of the four aspects along with a 0, +1, –1, or –2. Additionally, it shows one of three challenge icons on a band of color across the bottom: the Crest ( ) (red), the Mountain ( ) (blue), or the Sun ( ) (orange). These icons match those found next to challenge effects on cards in play.

  • After resolving a test, if any challenge cards that show the reshuffle icon   were put into the discard, shuffle the challenge discard back into the challenge deck.

  • Occasionally, rules effects other than tests may have you draw a challenge card as a randomizer. In these cases, do not resolve challenge effects unless otherwise specified. However, if the challenge card shows a reshuffle icon ( ) and is discarded, shuffle the challenge discard back into the challenge deck.
